spec_data.Name: votca-tools-devel
spec_data.Description:
Versatile Object-oriented Toolkit for Coarse-graining Applications (VOTCA) is
a package intended to reduce the amount of routine work when doing systematic
coarse-graining of various systems. The core is written in C++.

This package contains development headers and libraries for votca-tools.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 04 Sep 2017 10:20:22 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Development headers and libraries for votca-tools
